about_the_game:
Welcome to "Echoes From The Past," an engaging adventure game that takes you on a mysterious journey through an abandoned sanatorium from 1980. Join Cerys Baker on her investigations after receiving a mysterious letter instructing her to visit Oak Sanatorium, which has been experiencing increasingly strange occurrences since its sudden closure. Immerse yourself in the eerie atmosphere of this deserted place and confront the secrets waiting to be uncovered.

Listen to the Echoes

Explore the halls of Oak Sanatorium and listen to the echoes that reveal the history of the place. Each room holds its own secrets and stories. Be attentive and look for clues that can help you solve the puzzle of this eerie place.

Solve Puzzles

Oak Sanatorium is a labyrinth of secrets and puzzles. To progress and unveil the truth, you must showcase your skills and solve tricky puzzles. Use your logical thinking and observation skills to discover hidden clues and decipher the puzzles that stand between you and solving the mystery.

Face the Power

Maintain composure and remain inconspicuous as you navigate through the sanatorium. The dark forces haunting the place are vigilant and ready to confront anyone attempting to uncover their secrets. Stealthily sneak past dangers and avoid attention to secure your survival and bring the truth to light.

Are you ready to confront the Echoes of Oak Sanatorium and unravel the secrets of this eerie place? Immerse yourself in this captivating adventure and experience a story full of suspense, puzzles, and unexpected twists.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 8 Generation or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 10 Generation or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Join Cerys Baker in the gloomy Oak Sanatorium, discover its secrets and keep your sanity. Solve puzzles, resist dark forces and experience suspense, horror and mystery in this captivating exploration game. Are you strong enough?
supported_languages:
English, German*, French
*languages with full audio support
